title: What are the specifications of the Realme C15? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Realme C series is a gaming smartphone series in the affordable range. The Realme C3 released in February 2020 changed the mobile gaming dynamic completely and since then, Realme C series has provided users with some decent and strong gaming options within the budgets of the consumers. Realme C15 is a recent release by the brand in the same category. It is priced at 11,999rs with a single variant of 4GB RAM and 64GB internal memory. This phone does have quite a few features integrated into it that can be regarded as the highlight of this device. It is available in two colours - Marine blue and Seagull silver.  Let’s discuss the features and specifications of the Realme C15. Realme C15 has a 6.5 - inch IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen with 720*1560 pixels.It comes with Corning Gorilla Glass protectionThe phone is powered by Mediatek Helio G35 chipset processor. (Arm-Cortex A53 CPU and an IMG PowerVR GE8320 GPU with a frequency of 680 Mhz.)The camera is quad rear with a primary 13MP wide-angle lens (aperture f/2.2), supported by an 8MP (aperture f/2.3) + 2MP (aperture f/2.4) + 2MP (aperture f/2.4) specs.It has other camera features such as HDR, Panorama as well as an LED flash.It comes with an 8MP selfie camera at the front.The battery power is 6000mAh and it supports 18W fast charging as well.In aspects of connectivity, this smartphone has Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS, Radio and USB.It also comes with a rear-mounted fingerprint sensor.These are the specifications of the Realme C15. I think the massive 6000mAh battery will make for a great aspect in terms of usage and power backup especially in gaming support. The battery and the strong RAM paired with the Helio processor makes the Realme C15 a decent mid-range option for users who want a smartphone for daily and regular usage. The gaming features are an added bonus and make this phone a viable choice for gamers as well.

The phone comes packed with an array of impressive features and specifications and one of the best things about it is the fact that it is a budget gaming smartphone just like its other siblings in the lineup. It is a gaming smartphone, in the budget segment and it is undoubtedly one of the fine options for anyone who is looking for an affordable and powerful gaming phone in a budget.  A good gaming phone needs a combination of quite a few features and Realme has managed to check them all for its consumers. Starting with the display, it flaunts a 6.50-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 720x 1600 pixels. Realme C15 comes with 4GB of RAM, which is a good thing for a budget phone. The phone runs Android 10 and is powered by a mega massive battery of 6000mAh battery that also supports 18W fast charging. Realme is touting the Realme C15 battery as the USP of the smartphones and also something that sets it apart from another C-series phone. Moving on the cameras; Realme C15 packs a combination of 13-megapixel primary camera with a f/2.2 aperture; a second 8-megapixel camera with a f/2.25 aperture; a third 2-megapixel camera with an f/2.4 aperture and a fourth 2-megapixel camera with an f/2.4 aperture on the rear along with autofocus. The phone on the front flaunts an 8-megapixel camera on the front for selfies, with an f/2.0 aperture.  The Realme C15 runs Realme UI based on Android 10, as mentioned earlier. It packs 64GB of inbuilt storage that can be further expanded via microSD card with a dedicated slot. The Realme C15 is a dual-SIM cards. As far as the dimensions of the phone is concerned, Realme C15 measures 164.50 x 75.90 x 9.80mm (height x width x thickness) and weighs 209.00 grams. There are two color variants available for this phone; Marine Blue and Seagull Silver. Connectivity options on the Realme C15 include Wi-Fi, GPS, Bluetooth v5.00, Micro-USB, 3G and 4G. A few of the sensors that are included in the phone are; accelerometer, ambient light sensor, proximity sensor and fingerprint scanner. Overall, looking at the specifications of the phone, there is no doubt that it is a powerful smartphone in the budget segment.
